verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came כְּכַלּ֣וֹת <WH3615> ke-chal-Lot had finished שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh, And it came to pass when Solomon לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1129> liv-Not the building אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech; and the king's וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all חֵ֣שֶׁק <WH2837> Che-shek desire שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh, and all Solomon's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which חָפֵ֖ץ <WH2654> cha-Fetz which he was pleased לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> la-'a-Sot. to do פ Peh

וַיֵּרָ֧א <WH7200> vai-ye-Ra appeared יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh That the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh to Solomon שֵׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> she-Nit; the second time כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher he נִרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> nir-'Ah as he had appeared אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> 'e-Lav to him בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1391> be-giv-'on. unto him at Gibeon

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him שָׁ֠מַעְתִּי <WH8085> ma'-ti unto him I have heard אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- תְּפִלָּתְךָ֣ <WH8605> te-fil-la-te-Cha thy prayer וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et תְּחִנָּתְךָ֮ <WH8467> te-chin-na-te-Cha and thy supplication אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הִתְחַנַּ֣נְתָּה <WH2603> hit-chan-Nan-tah that thou hast made לְפָנַי֒ <WH6440> le-fa-Nai before הִקְדַּ֗שְׁתִּי <WH6942> hik-Dash-ti, me I have hallowed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> haz-Zeh this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בָּנִ֔תָה <WH1129> ba-Ni-tah, which thou hast built לָשֽׂוּם־ <WH7760> la-sum- to put שְׁמִ֥י <WH8034> she-Mi my name שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham there עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- there for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> o-Lam; ever וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become עֵינַ֧י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai and mine eyes וְלִבִּ֛י <WH3820> ve-lib-Bi and mine heart שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham will be there כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- shall be there הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim. shall be there perpetually

וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> te-Lech walked לְפָנַ֗י <WH6440> le-fa-Nai, before כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after הָלַ֜ךְ <WH1980> ha-Lach walked דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> da-Vid me as David אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha thy father בְּתָם־ <WH8537> be-tom- in integrity לֵבָ֣ב <WH3824> le-Vav of heart וּבְיֹ֔שֶׁר <WH3476> u-ve-Yo-sher, and in uprightness לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to do כְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher i צִוִּיתִ֑יךָ <WH6680> tziv-vi-Ti-cha; according to all that I have commanded חֻקַּ֥י <WH2706> chuk-Kai my statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> u-mish-pa-Tai and my judgments תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <WH8104> tish-Mor. thee [and] wilt keep

וַהֲקִ֨מֹתִ֜י <WH6965> va-ha-Ki-mo-Ti Then I will establish אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כִּסֵּ֧א <WH3678> kis-Se the throne מַֽמְלַכְתְּךָ֛ <WH4467> mam-lach-te-Cha of thy kingdom עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El upon Israel לְעֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; for ever כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher I דִּבַּ֗רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti, as I promised עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> da-Vid to David אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha thy father לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not יִכָּרֵ֤ת <WH3772> yik-ka-Ret There shall not fail לְךָ֙ le-Cha אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, thee a man מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> me-'Al over כִּסֵּ֥א <WH3678> kis-Se upon the throne יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if שׁ֨וֹב <WH7725> Shov [But] if ye shall at all תְּשֻׁב֜וּן <WH7725> te-shu-Vun turn אַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you וּבְנֵיכֶם֙ <WH1121> u-ve-nei-Chem me ye or your children מֵֽאַחֲרַ֔י <WH310> me-'a-cha-Rai, from following וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo not תִשְׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> tish-me-Ru and will not keep מִצְוֹתַ֣י <WH4687> mitz-vo-Tai my commandments חֻקֹּתַ֔י <WH2708> chuk-ko-Tai, [and] my statutes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti which I have set לִפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Chem; before וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֗ם <WH1980> va-ha-lach-Tem, you but go וַעֲבַדְתֶּם֙ <WH5647> va-'a-vad-Tem and serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> 'a-che-Rim, other וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <WH7812> ve-hish-ta-cha-vi-Tem and worship לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

וְהִכְרַתִּ֣י <WH3772> ve-hich-rat-Ti Then will I cut off אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, Israel מֵעַ֨ל <WH5921> me-'Al of פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> pe-Nei out הָאֲדָמָה֙ <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah of the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti which I have given לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit them and this house אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הִקְדַּ֣שְׁתִּי <WH6942> hik-Dash-ti which I have hallowed לִשְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> lish-Mi, for my name אֲשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> 'a-shal-Lach will I cast out מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al of פָּנָ֑י <WH6440> pa-Nai; of my sight וְהָיָ֧ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah will become יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El and Israel לְמָשָׁ֥ל <WH4912> le-ma-Shal shall be a proverb וְלִשְׁנִינָ֖ה <WH8148> ve-lish-ni-Nah and a byword בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim. among all people

וְהַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> ve-hab-Ba-yit And at this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> haz-Zeh and this יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh will become עֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon, [which] is high כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- everyone עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> 'o-Ver every one that passeth עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav by יִשֹּׁ֣ם <WH8074> yish-Shom by it shall be astonished וְשָׁרָ֑ק <WH8319> ve-sha-Rak; and shall hiss וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> ve-'a-me-Ru, and they shall say עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and מֶ֨ה <WH4100> meh how long עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah done יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh Why hath the LORD כָּ֔כָה <WH3602> Ka-chah, thus לָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> la-'A-retz thus unto this land הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> haz-Zot likewise וְלַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> ve-lab-Ba-yit house הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. to this

וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> ve-'a-me-Ru, And they shall answer עַל֩ <WH5921> 'al and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who עָזְב֜וּ <WH5800> 'a-ze-Vu Because they forsook אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֗ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem, their God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> ho-Tzi who brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲבֹתָם֮ <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam their fathers מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> mitz-ra-Yim of Egypt וַֽיַּחֲזִ֙קוּ֙ <WH2388> vai-ya-cha-Zi-ku and have taken hold בֵּאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> be-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> 'a-che-Rim, upon other; וַיִּשְׁתַּחוּ vai-yish-ta-chu כוַיִּשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <WH7812> vai-yish-ta-cha-Vu bow down קלָהֶ֖ם la-Hem וַיַּעַבְדֻ֑ם <WH5647> vai-ya-'av-Dum; them and served עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> Ken, after that הֵבִ֤יא <WH935> he-Vi brought יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh them therefore hath the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem, and אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah upon them all this evil הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> haz-Zot. likewise פ Peh

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, came מִקְצֵה֙ <WH7097> mik-Tzeh And it came to pass at the end עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim of twenty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which בָּנָ֥ה <WH1129> ba-Nah had built שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh when Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> she-Nei the two הַבָּתִּ֑ים <WH1004> hab-bat-Tim; houses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech. and the king's

חִירָ֣ם <WH2438> chi-Ram ([Now] Hiram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the king צֹ֠ר <WH6865> tzor of Tyre נִשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> nis-Sa had furnished אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh Solomon בַּעֲצֵי֩ <WH6086> ba-'a-Tzei trees אֲרָזִ֨ים <WH730> 'a-ra-Zim with cedar וּבַעֲצֵ֧י <WH6086> u-va-'a-Tzei trees בְרוֹשִׁ֛ים <WH1265> ve-ro-Shim and fir וּבַזָּהָ֖ב <WH2091> u-vaz-za-Hav and with gold לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all חֶפְצ֑וֹ <WH2656> chef-Tzo; acceptable אָ֡ז <WH227> 'az for יִתֵּן֩ <WH5414> yit-Ten gave הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech king שְׁלֹמֹ֤ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh Solomon לְחִירָם֙ <WH2438> le-chi-Ram Hiram עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty עִ֔יר <WH5892> 'Ir, cities בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land הַגָּלִֽיל׃ <WH1551> hag-ga-Lil. of Galilee

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze came out חִירָם֙ <WH2438> chi-Ram And Hiram מִצֹּ֔ר <WH6865> mitz-Tzor, from Tyre לִרְאוֹת֙ <WH7200> lir-'Ot to see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim, the cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַן־ <WH5414> na-tan- had given ל֖וֹ lo שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh; which Solomon וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יָשְׁר֖וּ <WH3474> ya-she-Ru direct בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nav. affliction

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said מָ֚ה <WH4100> mah What הֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim What cities הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, are these אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נָתַ֥תָּה <WH5414> na-Tat-tah [are] these which thou hast given לִּ֖י li אָחִ֑י <WH251> 'a-Chi; another וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra bewray לָהֶם֙ la-Hem אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz them the land כָּב֔וּל <WH3521> ka-Vul, of Cabul עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. to this פ Peh

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent חִירָ֖ם <WH2438> chi-Ram And Hiram לַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> lam-Me-lech; to the king מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> me-'Ah hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim twenty כִּכַּ֥ר <WH3603> kik-Kar talents זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> za-Hav. of gold

וְזֶ֨ה <WH2088> ve-Zeh now this דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- And this [is] the reason הַמַּ֜ס <WH4522> ham-Mas of the levy אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which הֶעֱלָ֣ה׀ <WH5927> he-'e-Lah raised הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech which king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh, Solomon לִבְנוֹת֩ <WH1129> liv-nOt for to build אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> beit the house יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בֵּיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> bei-To and his own house וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַמִּלּ֔וֹא <WH4407> ham-mil-Lo, and Millo וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et חוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> cho-Mat and the wall יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חָצֹ֥ר <WH2674> cha-Tzor and Hazor וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מְגִדּ֖וֹ <WH4023> me-gid-Do and Megiddo וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et גָּֽזֶר׃ <WH1507> Ga-zer. and Gezer

פַּרְעֹ֨ה <WH6547> par-'Oh [For] Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt עָלָ֗ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah, had gone up וַיִּלְכֹּ֤ד <WH3920> vai-yil-Kod and taken אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גֶּ֙זֶר֙ <WH1507> ge-zer Gezer וַיִּשְׂרְפָ֣הּ <WH8313> vai-yis-re-Fah and burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh, it with fire וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֛י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanites הַיֹּשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> hai-yo-Shev that dwelt בָּעִ֖יר <WH5892> ba-'Ir in the city הָרָ֑ג <WH2026> ha-Rag; and slain וַֽיִּתְּנָהּ֙ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nah and given שִׁלֻּחִ֔ים <WH7964> shil-lu-Chim, it [for] a present לְבִתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> le-vit-To unto his daughter אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> 'E-shet wife שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> she-lo-Moh. Solomon's
